content:
A Lumia Bottle can take you to faraway places,
But along the Astralink, anything could happen,
And sometimes, it leaves behind... rather peculiar memories.
info: 幻雪关于流光瓶闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
There are actually many fascinating places to explore,
And Sani surely knows them all,
When it comes to exploration, no one can match the Windward Association.
info: 幻雪关于流光瓶闲聊_幻雪流程闲聊1

content:
So, do you have a destination in mind for exploration?
The nearby <color=#8AAB4B>Qianpo Road</color> is known for its precious gems,
while the more distant <color=#8AAB4B>Taochuan Road</color> is rich in pottery.

content:

No, that's just an advertisement for Lumia bottles.
